OS X, I don't know how to tell you this, but I never ever want to shut down my computer at 12:30pm when I have 20 apps open
Parts of the park have become overrun with terrorists who blast their propaganda out to everyone- and the park lackadaisically removes them
The park, with its 4,000 employees, is more concerned about building new additions to the playground so it can sell them to advertisers.
The park is filled with racists, sexists, and trolls who shout epithets at women having their own separate discussions.
To get some perspective, take every argument someone has about Twitter and replace it with 'the park'.
This shit is weak no matter who it's coming from https://t.co/1U1bsBV99e

Are you fucking serious? Like seriously? Just spent ANOTHER hour fixing the lost hour of work and Illustrator LOSES THAT.
It's not like I don't use you to make my living Illustrator. Don't worry about crashing all morning.
Illustrator corrupted a file. Lost some work. Aghhhh.
@safetyguy1656 Nice tail lights indeed. It also has really nice headlights. And clean lines for the hood / door. Wish I had the $$$.
Wanting to purchase a polaroid... not having the money, really.
Death Cab for Cutie were amazing. I meant to say that last night but I was overwhelmed with awesome.
Cleaning kind of- what I would give for a new apartment and a blank slate. I'm fucking buried in stuff that I can't throw away or store. Ugh
iTunes on Shuffle went from T.I.'s "Don't you wanna be high" which goes "Hey, listen baby, come fly wit me". to Sinatra's "Come Fly With Me"
Feeling like I've done nothing as of late- need to do /something/. Code. Draw. Anything. Ugh.
Mobile Photo: My School's Top Books http://tinyurl.com/2zqgw3
Watching Stella on Joost- thank you internets!
Downloading / installing Joost.
Ramen + Peanut Sauce. Wishing I could watch a movie or some TV shows or something.
Sunday morning, wandering 'round, Tegan and Sara on the stereo. I feel movie-like, and that's one of my favorite feelings.
All this talk of Trackers with Nietzche tires me- so I sleep. Urgh.
Freenode #macosx says Leopard is to come on the 26th. A day before my birthday? Coincidence? I think not. Thanks Steve.
Played a little San Andreas on the projector- brick wall definitely isn't best. A sheet would help for sure. Guitar hero'd be sweet.
Setting up the PS2 + Projector. Too bad I don't really have any good walls to project onto.
Setting up a voicemail service to email me and do other cool stuff. Not that anyone cool leaves me voicemail anyway.
Still like a kite, and going to sleep. Mmm...
